reviewText: As one of the narrators tells us, not everyone can janitor.  This engrossing short film provides a glimpse into the world of the school custodian of yesteryear.  Watch him swab out the urinal and wipe the germs all over the rest of the men's room!  See toilet cooties spread hither & yon!  Be amazed at the pride he takes in his work!  Hear The Way of the Janitor!  And be thankful that your job is (I hope) not this bad.
